Question: In 2006, this person gained James Blunt's permission to record a parody of "You're Beautiful".
Hints: Several videos have included appearances by notable celebrities in addition to this person and his band.
Demento appeared in several of this person's earlier videos, such as "I Love Rocky Road" and "Ricky".
This person and his band toured as the opening act for The Monkees in mid-1987 for their second reunion tour of North America.
